# selectedImage

**Instance Property**

The source image the item uses to generate its selected image.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If `nil`, the item uses the value in [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarItem/image] instead. The item creates the images it displays from the alpha values in its source images. To prevent system tinting, use images with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage/RenderingMode-swift.enum/alwaysOriginal] rendering mode. The item clips any image that’s larger than its bounds.

## Configuring the item’s appearance

- **standardAppearance**: The appearance settings for a tab bar.
- **scrollEdgeAppearance**: The appearance settings for the tab bar when the edge of scrollable content aligns with the edge of the tab bar.
- **titlePositionAdjustment**: The offset to apply to the title’s position.
